title: Founder-Led Beauty Brands Are the Future | Akash Mehta
description: Today's guest is Akash Mehta, the Co-founder of beauty brand Fable & Mane. He is also the host of the podcast Founded Beauty. Akash started young on a path to rediscover his passion and pursue it relentlessly. He has worked as a Global Digital Manager for companies like Dior, Estée Lauder, and Burberry. He also made it to Forbes Under 30 list in Media Marketing.
